statements: UPDATE SensorData SET sensor_value = 10 WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE SensorData SET sensor_value = 25.5 WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE SensorData SET sensor_value = sensor_value * 1.1 WHERE sensor_type = 'Light' AND sensor_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174111');
